name: PurrtoniumDig (updated)
description:
TWO PLAYERS ARE NEEDED FOR THIS GAME.

AS THE PLAYER YOU GET TO CONTROL A SPACE CAT AND BATTLE AGAINST A FRIEND OF YOURS TO DISCOVER THE INVALUABLE SUBSTANCE. IN ORDER TO FIND SOME PURRTONIUM YOU NEED TO ROAM AROUND THE LEVEL WITH YOUR TRUSTY METAL DETECTOR. AS YOU APPROACH AN AREA WHERE SOMETHING IS HIDDEN BENEATH THE GROUND, THE LIGHT ATTACHED TO YOUR BACKPACK WILL BLINK FASTER AND FASTER THE CLOSER YOU GET, CHANGING COLOUR WHEN YOU ARE CLOSE ENOUGH TO DIG. THE FIRST ONE TO GATHER THREE PURRTONIUM WINS! BEWARE THOUGH BECAUS HIDDEN UNDERNEATH THE GROUND ARE ALSO POWER UPS, THINGS THAT HINDER YOU, AS WELL AS A LOT OF GARBAGE! GO GET THEM TIGER, I MEAN CAT, I MEAN SPACE CAT!
